verses.verse: מִזְמ֥וֹר <WH4210> A Psalm לְדָוִ֑ד <WH1732> of David בִּ֝הְיוֹת֗וֹ <WH1961> was in בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <WH4057> when he was in the wilderness יְהוּדָֽה׃ <WH3063> of Judah אֱלֹהִ֤ים ׀ <WH430> O God אֵלִ֥י <WH410> thou [art] my God אַתָּ֗ה <WH859> I אֲ‍ֽשַׁחֲ֫רֶ֥ךָּ <WH7836> early will I seek צָמְאָ֬ה <WH6770> thirsteth לְךָ֨ ׀ נַפְשִׁ֗י <WH5315> thee my soul כָּמַ֣הּ <WH3642> longeth לְךָ֣ בְשָׂרִ֑י <WH1320> for thee my flesh בְּאֶֽרֶץ־ <WH776> land צִיָּ֖ה <WH6723> for thee in a dry וְעָיֵ֣ף <WH5889> and thirsty בְּלִי־ <WH1097> where no מָֽיִם׃ <WH4325> water
כֵּ֭ן <WH3651> Thus בַּקֹּ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> thee in the sanctuary חֲזִיתִ֑יךָ <WH2372> so [as] I have seen לִרְא֥וֹת <WH7200> To see עֻ֝זְּךָ֗ <WH5797> thy power וּכְבוֹדֶֽךָ׃ <WH3519> and thy glory
כִּי־ <WH3588> Because ט֣וֹב <WH2896> [is] better חַ֭סְדְּךָ <WH2617> Because thy lovingkindness מֵֽחַיִּ֗ים <WH2416> than life שְׂפָתַ֥י <WH8193> my lips יְשַׁבְּחֽוּנְךָ׃ <WH7623> shall praise
כֵּ֣ן <WH3651> So אֲבָרֶכְךָ֣ <WH1288> Thus will I bless בְחַיָּ֑י <WH2416> thee while I live בְּ֝שִׁמְךָ <WH8034> in thy name אֶשָּׂ֥א <WH5375> I will lift up כַפָּֽי׃ <WH3709> my hands

כְּמ֤וֹ <WH3644> with חֵ֣לֶב <WH2459> as [with] marrow וָ֭דֶשֶׁן <WH1880> and fatness תִּשְׂבַּ֣ע <WH7646> shall be satisfied נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> My soul וְשִׂפְתֵ֥י <WH8193> lips רְ֝נָנ֗וֹת <WH7445> [thee] with joyful יְהַלֶּל־ <WH1984> shall praise פִּֽי׃ <WH6310> and my mouth

אִם־ <WH518> When זְכַרְתִּ֥יךָ <WH2142> When I remember עַל־ <WH5921> on יְצוּעָ֑י <WH3326> thee upon my bed בְּ֝אַשְׁמֻר֗וֹת <WH821> on thee in the [night] watches אֶהְגֶּה־ <WH1897> [and] meditate בָּֽךְ׃

כִּֽי־ <WH3588> for הָיִ֣יתָ <WH1961> have been עֶזְרָ֣תָה <WH5833> Because thou hast been my help לִּ֑י וּבְצֵ֖ל <WH6738> therefore in the shadow כְּנָפֶ֣יךָ <WH3671> of thy wings אֲרַנֵּֽן׃ <WH7442> will I rejoice
דָּבְקָ֣ה <WH1692> followeth hard נַפְשִׁ֣י <WH5315> My soul אַחֲרֶ֑יךָ <WH310> after בִּ֝֗י תָּמְכָ֥ה <WH8551> upholdeth יְמִינֶֽךָ׃ <WH3225> thee thy right hand

וְהֵ֗מָּה <WH1992> those לְ֭שׁוֹאָה <WH7722> to destroy יְבַקְשׁ֣וּ <WH1245> But those [that] seek נַפְשִׁ֑י <WH5315> my soul יָ֝בֹ֗אוּ <WH935> [it] shall go בְּֽתַחְתִּיּ֥וֹת <WH8482> into the lower parts הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> of the earth

יַגִּירֻ֥הוּ <WH5064> They shall fall עַל־ <WH5921> unto יְדֵי־ <WH3027> the power חָ֑רֶב <WH2719> of the sword מְנָ֖ת <WH4521> they shall be a portion שֻׁעָלִ֣ים <WH7776> for foxes יִהְיֽוּ׃ <WH1961> become

וְהַמֶּלֶךְ֮ <WH4428> But the king יִשְׂמַ֪ח <WH8055> shall rejoice בֵּאלֹ֫הִ֥ים <WH430> in God יִ֭תְהַלֵּל <WH1984> by him shall glory כָּל־ <WH3605> Everyone הַנִּשְׁבָּ֣ע <WH7650> every one that sweareth בּ֑וֹ כִּ֥י <WH3588> for יִ֝סָּכֵ֗ר <WH5534> shall be stopped פִּ֣י <WH6310> but the mouth דֽוֹבְרֵי־ <WH1696> of them that speak שָֽׁקֶר׃ <WH8267> lies
